projects.title: EvaraStaffing
projects.shortDescription: Consultancy website with resume upload functionality for staffing solutions.

caseStudy.overview: EvaraStaffing wanted a professional site where job seekers could upload resumes while presenting their services in a credible way.
caseStudy.challenge: Their old setup lacked branding, clear structure, and a system to handle candidate submissions.
caseStudy.research: Looked at staffing competitors to identify features like resume uploads, clear CTAs, and trust-building layouts.
caseStudy.approach: Chose WordPress with Elementor for quick customization and scalability, keeping future updates simple.
caseStudy.implementation: Designed a clean interface, built a resume upload form, and structured service pages for easy browsing.
caseStudy.solution: Delivered a consultancy platform with direct resume submissions, polished visuals, and service clarity.
caseStudy.results: Saw a 45% increase in candidate submissions and more client inquiries within weeks.
caseStudy.impact: Helped EvaraStaffing scale digitally and simplify their recruitment flow.
caseStudy.lessons: Straightforward navigation and visible CTAs significantly improve conversions.

testimonial.quote: The resume upload feature has been a game-changer for our hiring process.
testimonial.author: Client

projects.title: Tourly
projects.shortDescription: Modern travel packages and booking platform for tours and trips.

caseStudy.overview: Tourly needed a modern platform that made browsing and booking trips easy and enjoyable.
caseStudy.challenge: The old site felt static, outdated, and didn’t offer smooth booking flows.
caseStudy.research: Studied leading travel portals to figure out what makes browsing intuitive and fun.
caseStudy.approach: Built with React and GSAP to deliver fast performance and engaging animations.
caseStudy.implementation: Developed dynamic package pages, smooth transitions, and a responsive booking form.
caseStudy.solution: Created a lively, mobile-first travel site that highlights packages and streamlines booking.
caseStudy.results: Inquiries for tours grew steadily, and customers reported a smoother experience.
caseStudy.impact: Tourly could compete with larger platforms and stand out with better usability.
caseStudy.lessons: Adding motion and interactivity makes users spend more time exploring.

testimonial.quote: Customers love how easy it is to browse and book trips now.
testimonial.author: Owner

projects.title: RV Internet
projects.shortDescription: Tech website showcasing routers, modems, and internet solutions.

caseStudy.overview: RV Internet wanted a modern site to showcase routers and connectivity solutions clearly.
caseStudy.challenge: Their existing site was outdated, cluttered, and didn’t highlight products properly.
caseStudy.research: Analyzed competitor ISP websites to see how they structured product categories.
caseStudy.approach: Used JavaScript with Tailwind to design a sleek, responsive layout.
caseStudy.implementation: Organized products into categories, added visuals, and built trust-focused sections.
caseStudy.solution: Delivered a clean, modern internet solutions site with focus on usability.
caseStudy.results: Website inquiries increased, and customers found products easier to navigate.
caseStudy.impact: Improved brand credibility and positioned RV Internet as more professional.
caseStudy.lessons: A structured product layout improves trust and helps customers make decisions faster.

testimonial.quote: Our website finally reflects the trust and quality of our services.
testimonial.author: CEO

projects.title: Himachal Travel
projects.shortDescription: Travel guide with immersive motion design showcasing Himachal destinations.

caseStudy.overview: Himachal Travel wanted a travel guide that feels alive and inspiring.
caseStudy.challenge: Their old site looked flat and failed to capture the excitement of travel.
caseStudy.research: Checked top storytelling-based travel sites to learn how they engage users.
caseStudy.approach: Designed in Figma, then built with React and GSAP for interactive storytelling.
caseStudy.implementation: Created destination highlights with smooth animations and visual flow.
caseStudy.solution: Developed a motion-driven site that feels immersive and easy to explore.
caseStudy.results: User engagement rose, with more inquiries about travel packages.
caseStudy.impact: Made the platform stand out with its unique motion-based approach.
caseStudy.lessons: Motion and storytelling together create stronger emotional impact.

testimonial.quote: The animations make our travel showcase stand out beautifully.
testimonial.author: Client

projects.title: Dr Noor Oil
projects.shortDescription: E-commerce store for health oil products with cart and payment integration.

caseStudy.overview: Dr Noor Oil wanted to expand sales online with a smooth shopping experience.
caseStudy.challenge: They had no online presence and were missing out on digital customers.
caseStudy.research: Looked at successful health & wellness e-commerce stores for UX patterns.
caseStudy.approach: Chose Next.js with TypeScript for speed and reliability, hosted on Vercel.
caseStudy.implementation: Built product pages, added cart + checkout, and polished the UI.
caseStudy.solution: Delivered a professional e-commerce site ready for growth.
caseStudy.results: Online sales grew by 60% in just three months.
caseStudy.impact: Transformed their local business into a nationwide brand.
caseStudy.lessons: A seamless checkout process is critical to boosting e-commerce sales.

testimonial.quote: The new website has doubled our sales — seamless and professional.
testimonial.author: Dr Noor
